name: The Misadventures of Gwarmbee
description:
Play as Gwarmbee, the off white little fellow armed with only 4 directional shields available to defend with. Luckily all of your foes fire projectiles and they are super bouncy, so make the best use of your defenses to create some insane offense and kill those punks! Clear the dungeon floor, proceed to the next level. Simple.

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD - Move

Arrow Keys - Shield

TIPS:

Projectiles reflected with your shield turn blue, meaning they will now hurt enemies and if they hit you... heal you!

Watch your stamina bar (yellow bar). No stamina = no shields! :O
